name: Zombie Hospital
description:
WARNING!

This game is not recommended for persons under the twelve.

The game contains violence and terrible sound effects.

Game works with keyboard and mouse only

Find the entrance key and escape the hospital.

You are not alone

GOOD LUCK!

CONTROLS:

Move: WASD

Interact: left mouse button

SUPPORT ME IN ROBLOX:

1. You need a valid Roblox account and more than 3 Robux

2. Go to this page: https://www.roblox.com/games/8737602449/PLS-DONATE

3. Click on gift icon

4. Enter username: DV08games

6. Donate me 3, 5, 10, 20, 50, 100, 500, or 1000 Robux

THANKS FOR EVERY DONATION!
